meaningMnemonic: When <kanji>metropolis</kanji>es <kanji>meet</kanji> they become an <vocabulary>urban area</vocabulary>. This word is often used to mean <vocabulary>city</vocabulary> as opposed to the country or rural areas.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
